[[Version 1.1]]
*The description of Shining Miracle♪ was changed.
**{{Color|Old description}}: Heals friendly forces and all parties for a large amount of HP that scales with Barbara's Max HP. Barbara's desire to heal strengthens her will to fight and sing.
**{{Color|New description}}: Heals nearby allied characters and your characters in the party for a large amount of HP that scales with Barbara's Max HP.
----
[[Version 1.0]]
*Shining Miracle♪ was available upon [[Barbara]]'s release.
